title: 999 Wins, Riot plz
body: I've been on 999 wins for ages now and i've been wanting to play with a rioter for that 1000 please :C

replies.body: always such a nice guy sephyre, thanks, added :D
I didn't know that Rioters played with you for your thousandth win. I'm sitting on 1140 something now. :(

> [{quoted}](name=Dyrilby,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kceE51V2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-03T05:42:59.587+0000)
>
> I didn't know that Rioters played with you for your thousandth win. I'm sitting on 1140 something now. :(

Ask Rioters to join you for win 1141. I totally would.

> [{quoted}](name=Dyrilby,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kceE51V2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-03T05:42:59.587+0000)
>
> I didn't know that Rioters played with you for your thousandth win. I'm sitting on 1140 something now. :(

Back in the day 1,000 wins was actually an accomplishment and Rioters enjoyed playing full support teams etc, now people just do it cause they can.
I got 999 wins but with a Rioter ain't one.
